name: The European Marketing Agency TEMA
tag_list: multilingual-telemarketing, b2b-telemarketing, multilingual-recruitment, recruitment, translation, search-engine-optimization, search-engine-optimisation, business-process-outsourcing, outsourcing, international-services, international-telemarketing
overview:
The TEMA Group was founded in 2004 and specializes in localization services for businesses looking to expand into Europe. Based in the UK, TEMA’s companies Europlus Direct Ltd. and Occident Ltd. have clients like IBM and Lexmark, for example.

Globalization services include multilingual telemarketing, multilingual web & search engine optimization, recruitment of multilingual staff as well as translation of web content and marketing content.
